sentences.en: As a result, industry was overmanned and pen-pushers were everywhere.
sentences.cn: 结果是，企业人浮于事，到处都是耍笔杆子的人。

sentences.en: Compton was sending the ball here, there, and everywhere with each stroke.
sentences.cn: 康普顿一会将球打到这里，一会打到那里，每一拍的落点都不同。

sentences.en: Everywhere building facades are pitted with shell and bullet holes.
sentences.cn: 任一处的建筑物正面都布满了弹洞。

sentences.en: Everywhere in the house was a sticky trail of orange juice.
sentences.cn: 家里到处是泼洒的橙汁留下的黏糊糊的痕迹.

sentences.en: Fires broke out everywhere, the entire city went up in flames.
sentences.cn: 到处都燃起了火，整个城市陷入一片火海。

sentences.en: Girls everywhere are gagging for a car like this.
sentences.cn: 天底下的女孩儿都对这种车梦寐以求。

sentences.en: He follows me everywhere and it makes me feel so trapped.
sentences.cn: 他走到哪里都跟着我，我觉得被困住了。

sentences.en: I looked everywhere. I couldn't find him.
sentences.cn: 我到处都找了，就是找不到他。

sentences.en: I’ve looked everywhere but I can’t find the map.
sentences.cn: 我到处都找过了，但就是找不到地图。

sentences.en: Stars appeared everywhere, spinning round and round, faster and faster.
sentences.cn: 满眼金星乱转，而且越转越快。

sentences.en: The south should remain dry, but everywhere else will have heavy rain.
sentences.cn: 南部持续干旱，但其他地区会下暴雨。

sentences.en: they are the same machines used everywhere else in the world.
sentences.cn: 这些机器与世界上其他任何地方使用的机器一样。

sentences.en: They had to travel everywhere by bus.
sentences.cn: 他们只得乘公共汽车出行。

sentences.en: They have extended the potential life span of humanity everywhere.
sentences.cn: 世界各地人类的预期寿命均有所延长。

sentences.en: Wine and food of superlative quality are available everywhere at giveaway prices.
sentences.cn: 随处都能买到价格低廉而质量上乘的酒和食品。
